20074000.English_Text: (The barong that Han Su-min talked about is over there)

20074001.Original_Text: (앗?! 파견된 영교원 바롱이라는 게 반달호수에 만났던 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>둥둥</>이었다!)
20074001.English_Text: (Ah?! The dispatched Young Teacher Barong was the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Dong-Dong</> that I met at Lake Vandal!)
20074001.Chinese_Text: （啊？！派来的少老师巴龙就是我在汪达尔湖遇到的<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>东东</>！）

20074002.Original_Text: 아이쿠냥! 에엥? 너로구냥! 엄청나게 오래간만이다냥!\n네 활약은 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>영교원</>에서도 소문이 자자하다냥!
20074002.English_Text: Iku-nyang! Eh? It's you! It's been a really long time! \nYour activity is also rumored to be spreading in <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Younggyowon</>!
20074002.Chinese_Text: Iku-nyang！呃？是你！真的好久不见了！\n你的活动也传闻在<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Younggyowon</>！

20074003.Original_Text: (사연을 들었다며 지맥을 여는 걸 도와주겠다고 한다)
20074003.English_Text: (He said he heard the story and said he would help open the lei)
20074003.Chinese_Text: （他说他听到了这个故事，说他会帮忙打开林雷）

20074004.Original_Text: 정말이냥?! 나랑 같이 저 무시무시한 곳에 가서 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>우두머리</>를 없애면 된다냥!
20074004.English_Text: Really?! Go with me to that scary place and get rid of <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>boss</>!
20074004.Chinese_Text: 真的？！跟我去那个可怕的地方，干掉<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>boss</>！

20074005.Chinese_Text: （询问 Ley 和 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Boss</> 是否相关）

20074006.Original_Text: 지맥을 열기 위해선 특별한 장치를 조작해야 하는데, <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>우두머리</>가 그것을 막고 있다냥.\n그곳이 지맥의 기운이 가장 강해서 제일 센 놈이 그 곳을 차지하고 있는 거다냥!
20074006.English_Text: In order to open the Ley, you have to operate a special device, and the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Boss</> is blocking it.
20074006.Chinese_Text: 为了打开魔网，你必须操作一个特殊的装置，而<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Boss</>正在阻止它。

20074007.Original_Text: 자, 설명은 이만하면 충분하다냥!\n네가 있다니 든든하다냥. 가자냥~
20074007.English_Text: Come on, this explanation is enough!

20074008.English_Text: Like is blocked here as well!

20074009.Original_Text: 포악하기로 소문난 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>우두머리</>를 잡고 지맥을 열어야 한다냥.\n후우...! 너만 믿는다냥. 가자냥~!
20074009.English_Text: I have to grab the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>boss</> and open the ley, which is rumored to be vicious.
20074009.Chinese_Text: 我必须抓住 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>boss</> 并打开魔网，据说这是恶毒的。

20074011.English_Text: Let's grab the head of the predators and open the ley.
20074011.Chinese_Text: 让我们抓住掠食者的头颅，打开魔网。

20074012.Original_Text: 이곳은 음침하기 짝이 없는 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>버림받은 자들의 늪</>이다냥.
20074012.English_Text: This place is a dismal <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Swamp of the Forsaken</>Nyanya.
20074012.Chinese_Text: 这个地方是一片惨淡的<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>被遗忘者沼泽</>Nyanya。

20074013.English_Text: Let's go mutate and kill the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>The Lost Red Eye</>.
20074013.Chinese_Text: 让我们去变异并杀死<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>失落的红眼</>。

20074015.Original_Text: 이 곳의 우두머리는 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>빛을 잃은 수목</>이다냥. 자, 가자냥.
20074015.English_Text: The boss of this place is <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>A tree that has lost its light</>. Come on, let's go.
20074015.Chinese_Text: 这个地方的老板是<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>一棵失去光的树</>。走吧，我们走。

20074016.Original_Text: 못 믿겠지만 이곳에 예전엔 큰 마을이 있었다고 한다냥.
20074016.English_Text: I can't believe it, but it's said that there used to be a big village here.
20074016.Chinese_Text: 我不敢相信，但据说这里曾经有一个大村庄。

20074017.English_Text: Now, sadly, everything has been mutated…
20074017.Chinese_Text: 现在，可悲的是，一切都发生了变异……

20074018.Original_Text: 검은새벽단은 이곳에 납치한 사람들을 가둬둔다는 무서운 소문이 있다냥!
20074018.English_Text: There's a scary rumor that the Black Dawn is locking up kidnapped people here!
20074018.Chinese_Text: 有一个可怕的谣言，黑色黎明将被绑架的人关在这里！

20074019.Original_Text: 우두머리를 처치해서 언제든 이곳으로 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>축지</>할 수 있게 지맥을 열자냥.
20074019.English_Text: Let's get rid of the boss and open up a ley so we can <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>chukji</> here at any time.
20074019.Chinese_Text: 让我们摆脱boss并打开一个地雷，这样我们就可以随时<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>chukji</>。

20074020.English_Text: This is the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Arsenal</>Danyang of the Black Dawn.
20074020.Chinese_Text: 这是<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>兵工厂</>黑色黎明的丹阳。

20074021.Original_Text: 이 무기고를 지키는 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>관리인 탄루</>를 처치해야 지맥을 열 수 있다냥.
20074021.English_Text: You have to defeat <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Keeper Tanru</> guarding this arsenal before you can unlock the Ley.
20074021.Chinese_Text: 你必须打败<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>守护者Tanru</>，才能解锁魔网。

20074022.Original_Text: 이곳은 해룡산맥에서 탁회의 기운이 가장 강한 곳이다냥.
20074022.English_Text: This is the place where the energy of Takhoe is strongest in the Haeryong Mountains.
20074022.Chinese_Text: 这里是海龙山中，太浩能量最强的地方。

20074023.English_Text: The goal is a terrifying <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Kuma the gatekeeper</>Danyang! Let's go inside carefully!
20074023.Chinese_Text: 目标是一个可怕的<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>看门人隈研吾</>丹阳！我们小心进去！

20074024.Original_Text: 이렇게 높은 곳까지 검은새벽단 녀석들이 진을 치고 있다니냥...
20074024.English_Text: It's like the Black Dawn guys are encamping up to such a high place...
20074024.Chinese_Text: 就好像黑色黎明那帮人要扎营到这么高的地方……

20074025.English_Text: Come on, let's go and kill <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Boss</> and unlock the Leys!
20074025.Chinese_Text: 来吧，让我们去杀死<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Boss</>并解锁魔域！

20074026.Original_Text: 이 곳의 묘지는 높은 곳에 있어서 가라앉지 않았다냥.
20074026.English_Text: The cemetery here is on a high place, so it didn't sink.
20074026.Chinese_Text: 这里的墓地在高处，所以没有下沉。

20074027.Original_Text: 그럼 뭐 하냥, 묘지를 관리해야 할 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>우두머리</>마저 변이되고 말았다냥...
20074027.English_Text: Then what the heck, even the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>boss</> who should manage the cemetery has mutated...
20074027.Chinese_Text: 那到底是怎么回事，连应该管理墓地的<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>boss</>都变异了……

20074028.Original_Text: 이곳엔 한 맺힌 원혼들이 가득하다냥. 으아아 무섭다냥.
20074028.English_Text: This place is full of unbroken spirits. Aww, it's scary.
20074028.Chinese_Text: 这个地方充满了不间断的精神。哇，好可怕。

20074029.Original_Text: 그래도 할 일은 해야지냥! 무시무시한 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>불마자 우두머리</>를 처지하자냥!
20074029.English_Text: But I still have to do it! Let's put the dreadful <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Busty Boss</> under the spot!
20074029.Chinese_Text: 但我仍然必须这样做！让我们把可怕的<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Busty Boss</>放在现场！

20074030.Original_Text: (저기 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>둥둥</>이 보인다. 가서 지맥 여는 것을 도와주자)
20074030.English_Text: (You can see <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Float</> over there. Let's go and help unlock the Ley)
20074030.Chinese_Text: （你可以看到<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>漂浮</>在那边。我们去帮助解锁魔网）

20074032.English_Text: (I see <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Float</> over there. Let's go help)
20074032.Chinese_Text: （我看到 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Float</> 在那边。我们去帮忙）

20074034.Original_Text: (<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>둥둥</>이 저기 있는 걸 보니 이곳도 지맥이 닫혀있나 보군)
20074034.English_Text: (<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Dong-Dong</> over there, it looks like the ley is also closed here)

20074036.English_Text: (<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Dong-Dong</> is waiting for you in advance. Let's go)

20074037.Original_Text: (저기 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>둥둥</>이 보인다. 이번엔 이 곳의 지맥을 열어야 하나보다)
20074037.English_Text: (I see <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Double</> over there. I think I need to open the lei here this time)
20074037.Chinese_Text: （我看到<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Double</>在那边。我想这次我需要在这里打开花环）

20074038.English_Text: (There's a <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Float</> over there. Let's get closer)
20074038.Chinese_Text: （那边有一个 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Float</>。让我们靠近一点）

20074039.Original_Text: (<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>둥둥</>이 지맥을 열기 위해 나를 기다리고 있다)
20074039.English_Text: (<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>floating</>waiting for me to open this ley)

20074040.Original_Text: (<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>둥둥</>이 보인다. 가서 지맥 여는 것을 도와주자)
20074040.English_Text: (<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>I see a float</>. Let's go help unlock the ley)
20074040.Chinese_Text: (<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>我看到一个漂浮物</>。我们去帮助解锁魔杖)

20074041.Original_Text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>우두머리</>를 처치하기 전에 이 녀석들을 먼저 소탕해야겠군!)
20074041.English_Text: (I'll have to clear these guys before I kill the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>boss</>!)
20074041.Chinese_Text: （我必须在杀死 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>boss</> 之前清除这些家伙！）
